files.patch:
@@ -1,1 +1,1 @@
-Usage: jcmd <pid | main class> [-T] <command ...|PerfCounter.print|-f file>
+Usage: jcmd <pid | main class> [-t] <command ...|PerfCounter.print|-f file>
@@ -5,1 +5,1 @@
-  -T flag ensures the dignostic command begins with a timestamp   
+  -t flag ensures the dignostic command begins with a timestamp
